required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Two New Electronic Cigarettes in Cigarette Smokers
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Two New Electronic Cigarettes in Cigarette Smokers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine differences in nicotine delivery, user behavior, subjective effects, and physiological effects, when cigarette smokers use an two new electronic cigarette devices (JUUL and IQOS) relative to their using their own brand of cigarettes.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood will be taken 4 times in each session: at baseline, 5 min after the start of a 10-puff product use, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Carbon Monoxide Levels
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Carbon monoxide levels will be assessed before and after product use in each approximately 4-hr session: at baseline, 5 min after the end of a 10-puff product use, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: Carbon monoxide levels (in parts per mission)

secondary_outcome.measure: Tiffany-Drobes Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Factor 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use reduces the intention to smoke a cigarette, and consists of 5 items that are scored 0 - 7, in which participants clicked seven discrete ratings from 'not at all' to 'extremely'. The items are summed and scores range from 0 to 30 with higher scores indicating higher craving for a cigarette.

secondary_outcome.measure: Tiffany-Drobes Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Factor 2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use reduces the intention to smoke a cigarette, and consists of 4 items that are scored 0 - 7, in which participants clicked seven discrete ratings from 'not at all' to 'extremely'. The items are summed and scores range from 0 to 24 with higher scores indicating higher craving for a cigarette.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Anxious
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects on anxiety and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Craving
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects on craving a cigarette and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Depression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects on depression and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Difficulty Concentrating
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects having difficulty concentrating and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Drowsy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects feeling drowsy and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Hunger
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects reducing hunger and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Impatient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects feeling impatient and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Irritable
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects feeling irritable and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Restless
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects feeling restless and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Desire for Sweets
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects having desire for sweets and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Hughes-Hatsukami Questionnaire - Urge to Smoke
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: This scale is used to assess the extent to which product use affects having the urge to smoke and consists of 1 item scored 0 - 100 with 0 being not at all and 100 being extremely.

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Nicotine Questionnaire - Awake
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: One question is used to assess how much product use makes participants feel awake, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Nicotine Questionnaire - Calm
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: One question is used to assess how much product use makes participants feel calm, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Nicotine Questionnaire - Concentrate
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: One question is used to assess how much product use helps participants concentrate, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Nicotine Questionnaire - Dizzy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: One question is used to assess how much product use makes participants feel dizzy, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Nicotine Questionnaire - Reduce Hunger
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: One question is used to assess how much product use reduces feeling of hunger, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Nicotine Questionnaire - Sick
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 4 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: before any product use, 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: One question is used to assess how much product use makes participants feel sick, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Product Use Questionnaire - Pleasant
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 2 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then after an approxiamtely 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: A single question is used to assess if product use felt pleasant, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Product Use Questionnaire - Taste Good
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 2 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then after an approxiamtely 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: A single question is used to assess if product use tasted good, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Product Use Questionnaire - Satisfying
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 2 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then after an approxiamtely 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: A single question is used to assess if product use felt satisfying, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

secondary_outcome.measure: Direct Effects of Product Use Questionnaire - Smoke Right Now
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire will be administered 2 times in each each approximately 4-hr session: 10 minutes after the start of a 10-puff use bout, and then after an approxiamtely 1-hour ad lib use period.
secondary_outcome.description: A single question is used to assess if product use made them want to use the product again right now, and is scored 0 (not at all) to 100 (extremely).

other_outcome.time_frame: Heat rate will be measured from baseline continuously throughout each each approximately 4-hr session
other_outcome.description: Change in heart rate, measured in beats per minute

other_outcome.time_frame: Blood pressure will be measured from baseline continuously throughout each approximately 4-hr session
other_outcome.description: Change in blood pressure, measured in mm/hg

arm_group.arm_group_label: electronic cigarette vs own brand use
arm_group.description: Participants will come in for three session. During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with JUUL, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with JUUL (the session will be approximately 3 hours). During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with IQOS, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with IQOS (the session will be approximately 3 hours). During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with their own brand cigarettes, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with their own brand cigarette (the session will be approximately 3 hours). The order of the sessions will be determined randomly and data about session will not be recorded or used in the analysis.

intervention.description: Effects of JUUL electronic cigarette use.
intervention.arm_group_label: electronic cigarette vs own brand use

intervention.description: Effects of IQOS electronic cigarette use.
intervention.arm_group_label: electronic cigarette vs own brand use

intervention.description: Effects of own brand cigarette use.
intervention.arm_group_label: electronic cigarette vs own brand use

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria--participants must be:
- healthy (determined by self-report)
- between the ages of 18-55
- willing to provide informed consent
- able to attend the lab and abstain from tobacco/nicotine as required and must agree to use designated products according to study protocol
- cigarette smokers
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women if they are breast-feeding or test positive for pregnancy (by urinalysis) at screening.
- Individuals who weigh less than 110 pounds
Some study details about the eligibility criteria are purposely omitted at this time to preserve scientific integrity. Full details will be posted at the conclusion of the study.

group.title: Electronic Cigarette vs Own Brand Use
group.description: Participants will come in for three session. During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with JUUL, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with JUUL (the session will be approximately 3 hours). During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with IQOS, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with IQOS (the session will be approximately 3 hours). During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with their own brand cigarettes, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with their own brand cigarette (the session will be approximately 3 hours). The order of the sessions will be determined randomly and data about session will not be recorded or used in the analysis.

group.title: Electronic Cigarette vs Own Brand Use
group.description: Participants will come in for three session. During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with JUUL, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with JUUL (the session will be approximately 3 hours). During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with IQOS, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with IQOS (the session will be approximately 3 hours). During one session, participants will first complete a 10-puff product use bout with their own brand cigarettes, and then a 90-minute ad lib product use bout with their own brand cigarette (the session will be approximately 3 hours). The order of the sessions will be determined randomly and data about session will not be recorded or used in the analysis.

outcome.description: Change in plasma nicotine level
outcome.time_frame: Blood will be taken 4 times in each session: at baseline, 5 min after the start of a 10-puff product use, and then before and after an approximately 1-hour ad lib use period.
outcome.population: One participant was missing a sample so data was only available for 17 participants for these analyses.

outcome.title: Heart Rate
outcome.description: Change in heart rate, measured in beats per minute
outcome.time_frame: Heat rate will be measured from baseline continuously throughout each each approximately 4-hr session

outcome.title: Blood Pressure
outcome.description: Change in blood pressure, measured in mm/hg
outcome.time_frame: Blood pressure will be measured from baseline continuously throughout each approximately 4-hr session

reported_events.desc: This protocol was minimal risk and All-Cause Mortality, Serious, and Other [Not Including Serious] Adverse Events were not monitored/assessed.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
